title: Commercial Leasing Due Diligence; Best Practices and a Call to Action
body: After 40 years in real estate and 27 years as a real estate attorney, I have seen everything there is to see in the commercial leasing realm. Today, I will teach you about screening commercial tenants.

title: Credit Scoring Commercial Tenants
body: Pulling a credit report on a prospective commercial tenant is an essential part of a property owner or managerâ€™s due diligence. Yet not all credit reports are created equal.

title: The Best Colorado Commercial Office Lease, Ever?

author.name: Chris Robbins
author.position: Owner - Cherry Creek East Office Building

body: What happens when you cross a retired lawyer and an office building owner?  It sounds like yet another bad lawyer joke, yet the answer might surprise you...
